
                              Seam Social Module
                               ${project.version}

 What is it?
 ===========

 Seam Social provide CDI bean to help interacting with social network service like Twitter,
 Foursquare, LinkedIn or Facebook. 
 
 
 Contents of distribution
 ========================

 docs/

    API Docs and reference guide.
  
 examples/

    Seam Social examples
  
 ...
  
 Licensing
 =========

 This distribution, as a whole, is licensed under the terms of the Apache
 License, Version 2.0 (see license.txt).

 Seam Social URLs
 ===============

 Seam 3 Social Module: http://www.sfwk.org/Seam3/SocialModule
 Seam 3 Home Page:      http://www.sfwk.org/Seam3
 Downloads:             http://www.sfwk.org/Seam3/DistributionDownloads
 Forums:                http://www.sfwk.org/Community/Seam3Users
 Source Code:           git://github.com/seam/social.git
 Issue Tracking:        http://jira.jboss.org/jira/browse/SEAMSOCIAL
